Zoom Communications press release (numbers-only fixture).

Third quarter fiscal year 2026 (quarter ended October 31, 2025).
Total revenue: 1,229.8 million.
Enterprise revenue: 741.4 million.
GAAP operating margin: 25.2%.
Non-GAAP operating margin: 41.2%.
Operating cash flow: 629.3 million.
Operating cash flow margin: 51.2%.
Free cash flow margin: 50.0%.
GAAP EPS: 2.01.
Non-GAAP EPS: 1.52.
Customers > $100,000 trailing-12-month revenue: up 9.2%.
Repurchased shares in Q3: 5.1 million.
Total shares repurchased under plan: 32.5 million.
Incremental repurchase authorization: 1.0 billion.
Remaining authorization: 310.4 million.

GAAP income from operations: 310.4 million.
Non-GAAP income from operations: 507.0 million.
GAAP net income: 612.9 million.
Non-GAAP net income: 462.8 million.
Cash and marketable securities: 7.9 billion.
Free cash flow: 614.3 million.

Guidance - Q4 FY2026:
Revenue: 1.230 to 1.235 billion.
Constant-currency revenue: 1.224 to 1.229 billion.
Non-GAAP income from operations: 477.0 to 482.0 million.
Non-GAAP EPS: 1.48 to 1.49.
Weighted average shares: 305 million.

Guidance - Full FY2026:
Revenue: 4.852 to 4.857 billion.
Constant-currency revenue: 4.844 to 4.849 billion.

Free cash flow: 1.860 to 1.880 billion.
